steps.description: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, use an electric mixer to beat the butter until creamy.

subStep1.description: Add sugar to the mixing bowl and continue beating until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.

subStep2.description: Beat in eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to fully incorporate before adding the next.

steps.description: In a separate bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and milk. Add vanilla extract and whisk until smooth.
Add dry ingredients to the mixing bowl in three parts, alternating with wet ingredients, beginning and ending with dry ingredients.
Divide batter evenly between prepared pans and smooth tops.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

subStep1.description: Remove from oven and let cool in pans for 10 minutes before transferring to wire racks.

steps.description: Let cool completely on wire racks before serving.
